product.name: Lush Decor Linen Button Window Curtain Panel, Single, 40" W x 84" L, Linen - Country Curtains - Rustic Decor - Color Block Modern Farmhouse Curtains For Living Room, Bedroom & Dining Room
product.description: Add the look of linen to your home with our charming Linen Button Window Curtain. This single panel is perfect addition for your farmhouse styled home with the look of linen, modern color block design, pleating, and coconut husk button details. Slight weave variations are authentic to this natural fiber blend, creating a one-of-a-kind look. This unique window curtains panel adds subtle style to your bedroom, living room, dining room, or dorm room. The charming rustic vibe of these panels will enhance your decor without overpowering the look of your space. These farmhouse curtains for living room provide privacy while helping to filter sunlight, allowing a soft glow to fill the room, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. This country curtain is crafted from a linen-like cotton fabric blend of 52% Polyester, 37% Cotton, and 8% Viscose. The 6 coconut husk buttons add a unique touch to your space while providing a handcrafted feel. Please note this curtain is sold by the single panel. No matter which color or length you choose, each panel measures 40 inches wide, with some panels offered in a width of 100". Our Linen Button window panel offers seamless installation with its 3" rod pocket, allowing you to easily slide it onto your curtain rod, or by using clip rings (not included). These farmhouse curtains for bedroom and dining room curtains are easy to care for; simply machine wash cold on the gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. If needed, use a non-chlorine bleach for cleaning or an iron on low heat to release wrinkles. Please refer to the label for full care instructions.
product.bullet_points:
• Modern Farmhouse: Elevate your home decor with our charming Linen Button Window Curtain. This single panel is perfect as country farmhouse rustic curtains with the look of linen, modern color block design, pleating, and coconut husk buttons.
• The Linen-Look: This country curtain panel is crafted from a linen-like cotton fabric blend of 52% Polyester, 37% Cotton, and 8% Viscose. The 6 coconut husk buttons add a unique touch as window curtain panels with a handcrafted feel.
• Rustic Decor: Add the look of linen to your home with these linen curtains measuring 40 inches wide by 84 inches long. This panel works well as light filtering curtains, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
• Easy Installation: This linen curtain comes as 1 single window panel and offers seamless installation with its 3" rod pocket, allowing you to easily slide it onto your curtain rod, or by using clip rings (not included)
• Easy Care: This curtain is easy to care for, simply machine wash cold on the gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. If needed, use non-chlorine bleach or iron on low heat.
